title: Mansfield Park - The thoughts described support

content.prompt: The thoughts described in “nor could...fellow” most directly support which view of Mr. Rushworth?

choices.label: Money is more important to him than is intelligence.
His wealth makes him the undeserving target of criticism.
He denies that Miss Bertram is marrying him for his money.
People respect him only because he is wealthy.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
